title: As dangerous eugenic ideas spread, NIH falls silent
description: Federal research agencies are pulling back from fostering public discussions about science after the hollowing out of government communications offices.
content: Federal research agencies are pulling back from fostering public discussions about science after the hollowing out of government communications offices.
